text: 3.16: Zo 3.16; 13.1; 15.13; Ro 5.8; Ga 1.4; Ef 5.2; 5.25; 1 Te 2.8Zisas, ana nduara won tuma fekhɨngiap, nzan kurkura zav nza nzuav rimgi. Ana mba tɨva muuŋgiap, ana guigira won ndavar harigi gumgi ga ndɨɨi tɨvar nza khɨvigi. Nza maaŋ muuŋgiap mba tɨva kaŋgi. Nza vhɨra wari wo ntuua fusuv, nza phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi, nza mben kurkurarga.
